dict.acceptation: 有机（体）的；有组织的，系统的；器官的；根本的；

sent.orig: The Organic Trade Association, which represents 1,700 organic companies, wants to shore up organic food's image.
sent.trans: 代表了1700家有机食品公司的有机食品同业公会，希望保持有机食品的形象。

sent.orig: Organic Synthesis, Organic Catalysis, Organic Structure Analysis, Green Chemistry.
sent.trans: 有机合成，有机催化，有机结构分析，绿色化学。

sent.orig: Organic-inorganic compound fertilizer is kind of compound fertilizer of specific quantity Organic fertilizer.
sent.trans: 有机-无机复混肥料是指含有一定量有机肥料的复混肥料。

sent.orig: Some wines are 100 percent organic, while others say "made with organic grapes. "
sent.trans: 有些酒是100％天然的，而有些则标注说“制自天然葡萄”。

sent.orig: Therefore, one cannot ignore the contribution of biogenic volatile organic compounds to the secondary organic aerosols.
sent.trans: 二次有机气溶胶由于其对环境、气候和人体健康的影响，正日益受到人们的关注。
